tool.name: Intersects test
tool.description: This service shall return a true value if and only if the geometries g1 and g2 have at least one boundary point in common, but no interior points.

param.name: InputEntity1
param.label: the first geometry
param.help: the first geometry to compare against.

param.name: InputEntity2
param.label: the other geometry
param.help: the other geometry to compare against.
